chapter.title: Basic configuring of the archetype's layers, widgets and security.
chapter.para: This section explains how to activate or deactivate a number of pre-installed functionalities in the SmartGwt archetype. For each functionality, a link to their specific documentation document is included.

section.title: Layers
section.para: Geomajas is a GIS framework, so the central activity is on the map of the application. A map will generaly display a number of different layers, each on top of the other. Many different type of layer formats can be added: raster (OSM, WMS, TMS) or vector (MFS, SHP, PostGis).

section.title: General configuration
section.para: To add a layer to the map, a number of actions need to be performed. We explain the general scheme as it is used in the example application.

listitem.para: The layer properties: in an XML file, define a bean with the appropriate properties. e.g. "layerOsm.xml"
Create an XML file with a client bean. e.g. "clientLayerOsm.xml".
Add both new XML files to the web application path in the web.xml file.
Add the client bean to the map.
Add the client bean to the layer tree.
